Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; ENAMELLED
Name: Scarab
Description: Small scarab with all details represented schematically.  The obscure inscription "Redit Re", frequently found during the Second Intermediate Period, is carved on the reverse.
